mapper.select: select PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.ID, PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.CREATE_TIME, TASK_NAME, TASK_CODE, INIT_CODE, TASK_TYPE, CHARGE_ORG_ID, CHARGE_ORG_NAME, CHARGE_USER_ID, CHARGE_USER_NAME, PRODUCT_TYPE, CHASSIS_CODE, SAMPLE_STATUS, TASK_EXPLAIN, TASK_SYNOPSIS, TASK_FROM_REQUIRE, TASK_CYCLE_PLAN, SELF_TOTAL, PUBLIC_TOTAL, ACCO_COST, OIL_CHARGE_COST, HIGH_ROAD_COST, REPAIR_COST, TEMP_CARD_COST, BUSNIESS_COST, DANGER_COST, PUB_OIL_CHARGE_COST, OUT_SOURCE_COST, PUB_REPAIR_COST, TEST_FIELD_COST, TRIAL_TASK_ID, ATTACH_ID, ATTACH_NAME, APPLY_TIME, APPLY_USER_NAME, APPLY_USER_ID, SUBSIDY_REMARK, INIT_STATUS, PVORCV, road_send_cost, road_test_cost, parking_cost, trailer_rent_cost, transport_cost, transition_cost, TS_ATTACHMENT.SAVE_PATH AS ATTACH_PATH, PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.TASK_NUMBER, PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.OTHER_COST, PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.COST_TYPE from PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK LEFT JOIN TS_ATTACHMENT ON PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.ATTACH_ID = TS_ATTACHMENT.ID where PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_NAME = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_CODE = #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INIT_CODE = #{initCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_TYPE = #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE_ORG_ID = #{chargeOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE_ORG_NAME = #{chargeOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE_USER_ID = #{chargeUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE_USER_NAME = #{chargeUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_TYPE = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHASSIS_CODE = #{chassisCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAMPLE_STATUS = #{sampleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_EXPLAIN = #{taskExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_SYNOPSIS = #{taskSynopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_FROM_REQUIRE = #{taskFromRequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_CYCLE_PLAN = #{taskCyclePlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELF_TOTAL = #{selfTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUBLIC_TOTAL = #{publicTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCO_COST = #{accoCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OIL_CHARGE_COST = #{oilChargeCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIGH_ROAD_COST = #{highRoadCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPAIR_COST = #{repairCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMP_CARD_COST = #{tempCardCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSNIESS_COST = #{busniessCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DANGER_COST = #{dangerCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUB_OIL_CHARGE_COST = #{pubOilChargeCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUT_SOURCE_COST = #{outSourceCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUB_REPAIR_COST = #{pubRepairCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEST_FIELD_COST = #{testFieldCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIAL_TASK_ID = #{trialTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACH_ID = #{attachId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACH_NAME = #{attachName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_TIME = #{applyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_USER_NAME = #{applyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_USER_ID = #{applyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBSIDY_REMARK = #{subsidyRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INIT_STATUS = #{initStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PVORCV = #{pvorcv,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transition_cost = #{transitionCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transport_cost = #{transportCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trailer_rent_cost = #{trailerRentCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parking_cost = #{parkingCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
road_test_cost = #{roadTestCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
road_send_cost = #{roadSendCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_NUMBER = #{taskNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTHER_COST = #{otherCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COST_TYPE = #{costType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK set DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_NAME = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_CODE = #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INIT_CODE = #{chargeUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARGE_USER_NAME = #{chargeUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_TYPE = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHASSIS_CODE = #{chassisCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_STATUS = TASK_CYCLE_PLAN = #{taskCyclePlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELF_TOTAL = #{selfTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUBLIC_TOTAL = #{publicTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCO_COST = #{accoCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OIL_CHARGE_COST = #{oilChargeCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIGH_ROAD_COST = #{highRoadCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAIR_COST = #{repairCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMP_CARD_COST = #{tempCardCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSNIESS_COST = #{busniessCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DANGER_COST = #{dangerCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUB_OIL_CHARGE_COST = #{pubOilChargeCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUT_SOURCE_COST = = #{attachId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTACH_NAME = #{attachName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_TIME = #{applyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_USER_NAME = #{applyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_USER_ID = #{applyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBSIDY_REMARK = #{subsidyRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INIT_STATUS = #{initStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PVORCV = #{pvorcv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_NUMBER = #{taskNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTHER_COST = #{otherCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COST_TYPE = #{costType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (select tmp_tb.* , rownum rn from (SELECT PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.ID, PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.DEL_FLAG, PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.CREATE_BY, PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.CREATE_TIME, PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.UPDATE_BY, PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.UPDATE_TIME, PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.TASK_NUMBER, TASK_NAME, TASK_CODE, INIT_CODE, TASK_TYPE, CHARGE_ORG_ID, CHARGE_ORG_NAME, CHARGE_USER_ID, CHARGE_USER_NAME, PRODUCT_TYPE, CHASSIS_CODE, SAMPLE_STATUS, TASK_EXPLAIN, TASK_SYNOPSIS, TASK_FROM_REQUIRE, TASK_CYCLE_PLAN, SELF_TOTAL, PUBLIC_TOTAL, ACCO_COST, OIL_CHARGE_COST, HIGH_ROAD_COST, REPAIR_COST, TEMP_CARD_COST, BUSNIESS_COST, DANGER_COST, PUB_OIL_CHARGE_COST, OUT_SOURCE_COST, PUB_REPAIR_COST, TEST_FIELD_COST, TRIAL_TASK_ID, ATTACH_ID, ATTACH_NAME, APPLY_TIME, APPLY_USER_NAME, APPLY_USER_ID, SUBSIDY_REMARK, INIT_STATUS, PVORCV, TS_BASEBUS.ID AS BASEBUS_ID, OTHER_COST, COST_TYPE FROM PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK LEFT JOIN TS_BASEBUS ON TS_BASEBUS.BUSINESS_ID = PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.ID
ORDER BY PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.UPDATE_TIME DESC ) tmp_tb where rownum <= ${pager.endIndex}) where rn >= ${pager.startIndex}

SELECT
FROM PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK WHERE PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.DEL_FLAG != 1 AND PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.TRIAL_TASK_ID = #{trialTaskId} ORDER BY PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.UPDATE_TIME DESC

SELECT ACT_HI_PROCINST.PROC_INST_ID_ AS ACT_PROC_ID FROM PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK LEFT JOIN TS_BASEBUS ON TS_BASEBUS.BUSINESS_ID = PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.ID LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_PROCINST ON TS_BASEBUS.ID = ACT_HI_PROCINST.BUSINESS_KEY_ WHERE PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select temp.ID, sum(temp.TOTAL) AS cashAmount, temp.ITEMS_CODE as budgetCode, temp.ITEMS_NAME as budgetName, temp.STD_PRICE as stdPrice, temp.UNIT as unit from (select pbt.* from pc_budget_test pbt left join PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK PRI on PRI.ID = pbt.INIT_TASK_ID left join pc_trial_task ptt on ptt.ID = PRI.TRIAL_TASK_ID where ptt.ID = #{trialTaskId} and pbt.DEL_FLAG = 0
) temp group by temp.ID, temp.ITEMS_CODE, temp.ITEMS_NAME, temp.STD_PRICE, temp.UNIT

select temp.ID, sum(temp.TOTAL) AS cashAmount, temp.ITEMS_CODE as budgetCode, temp.ITEMS_NAME as budgetName, temp.DAYNUM from (select pbt.* from PC_BUDGET_PERSON pbt left join PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK PRI on PRI.ID = pbt.INIT_TASK_ID left join pc_trial_task ptt on ptt.ID = PRI.TRIAL_TASK_ID where ptt.ID = #{trialTaskId} and pbt.DEL_FLAG = 0
) temp group by temp.ID, temp.ITEMS_CODE, temp.ITEMS_NAME, temp.DAYNUM

select id, del_flag, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, driving_date, line_type, start_place, end_place, start_mileage, end_mileage, single_mileage, total_mileage, driver, remark, init_task_id from PC_DRIVING_RECORD where INIT_TASK_ID = #{initTaskId} and DEL_FLAG = 0 order by DRIVING_DATE
select * from PC_RELIABLE_INIT_TASK_RISK where DRIVE_RECORD_ID = #{id} and DEL_FLAG = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into PC_RELIABLE_INIT_TASK_RISK
ID,
DEL_FLAG,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_BY,
UPDATE_TIME,
DRIVE_RECORD_ID,
REMARKS,
ASSESSMENT,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{driveRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{assessment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update PC_RELIABLE_INIT_TASK_RISK
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRIVE_RECORD_ID = #{driveRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSESSMENT = #{assessment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, CREATE_TIME, TASK_NAME, TASK_CODE, INIT_CODE, TASK_TYPE, CHARGE_ORG_ID, CHARGE_ORG_NAME, CHARGE_USER_ID, CHARGE_USER_NAME, PRODUCT_TYPE, CHASSIS_CODE, SAMPLE_STATUS, TASK_EXPLAIN, TASK_SYNOPSIS, TASK_FROM_REQUIRE, TASK_CYCLE_PLAN, SELF_TOTAL, PUBLIC_TOTAL, ACCO_COST, OIL_CHARGE_COST, HIGH_ROAD_COST, REPAIR_COST, TEMP_CARD_COST, BUSNIESS_COST, DANGER_COST, PUB_OIL_CHARGE_COST, OUT_SOURCE_COST, PUB_REPAIR_COST, TEST_FIELD_COST, TRIAL_TASK_ID, ATTACH_ID, ATTACH_NAME, APPLY_TIME, APPLY_USER_NAME, APPLY_USER_ID, SUBSIDY_REMARK, INIT_STATUS, TASK_NUMBER, OTHER_COST, COST_TYPE from PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK where TRIAL_TASK_ID = #{trialTaskId} and DEL_FLAG = 0
mapper.update: update trial_task_id = #{trialTaskId} from PC_RELIABLE_INITTASK where id = #{id}
